locations.name: Bali
locations.description: A tropical island known for its beaches, culture, and scenic views.

locations.name: Jakarta
locations.description: The bustling capital city of Indonesia, offering vibrant shopping, historical landmarks, and cultural sites.

locations.name: Yogyakarta
locations.description: Known for its cultural heritage, including the ancient temples of Borobudur and Prambanan.

locations.name: Bandung
locations.description: Famous for its cool climate, shopping outlets, and natural beauty like Tangkuban Perahu Volcano.

locations.name: Lombok
locations.description: A beautiful island with pristine beaches, including Gili Islands and Mount Rinjani, known for trekking adventures.

locations.name: Komodo Island
locations.description: Famous for the Komodo dragons, this island also offers stunning dive spots and natural beauty.

locations.name: Raja Ampat
locations.description: A renowned diving destination with incredible coral reefs, beaches, and underwater biodiversity.

locations.name: Labuan Bajo
locations.description: The gateway to Komodo Island and known for its stunning scenery, beaches, and diving spots.

locations.name: Tana Toraja
locations.description: Famous for its traditional burial sites, architecture, and the unique culture of the Toraja people.

locations.name: Mount Bromo
locations.description: An active volcano in East Java, known for its stunning sunrise views and nearby Tengger Sand Sea.

locations.name: Bukit Tinggi
locations.description: A highland city in West Sumatra, famous for its cool climate, traditional Minangkabau culture, and culinary offerings.

locations.name: Belitung Island
locations.description: Known for its white sandy beaches, crystal clear waters, and granite rock formations.

locations.name: Ubud
locations.description: The cultural heart of Bali, known for its art, rice terraces, and spiritual attractions like temples and yoga retreats.

locations.name: Maluku Islands
locations.description: An archipelago known for its beautiful coral reefs, beaches, and the historically significant spice trade.

locations.name: The Thousand Islands (Kepulauan Seribu)
locations.description: An island chain located north of Jakarta, famous for its clear waters, marine life, and resorts.

locations.name: Pura Tanah Lot
locations.description: A sea temple perched on a rock, a popular tourist spot in Bali known for its breathtaking sunset views.

locations.name: Bunaken National Park
locations.description: A world-class dive spot in North Sulawesi, known for its rich marine biodiversity and coral reefs.

locations.name: Taman Safari
locations.description: A popular safari park with over 250 species of animals from around the world, located in West Java.

locations.name: Mount Rinjani
locations.description: An active volcano in Lombok, famous for trekking, crater lakes, and stunning landscapes.

locations.name: Gili Islands
locations.description: Known for its clear waters, vibrant coral reefs, and relaxed atmosphere, a perfect destination for diving and snorkeling.
